MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY14 postcode area of Beith. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:29pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:32am on 30th April
